snippet: It sank as far as $1.2035, the lowest since mid-2010, while the dollar climbed close to its highest level in nine years against a basket of major currencies.
lead_paragraph: It sank as far as $1.2035, the lowest since mid-2010, while the dollar climbed close to its highest level in nine years against a basket of major currencies.

headline.main: Euro Starts New Year at New Low
headline.print_headline: Euro Starts New Year at New Low
